summary: This is a forwarded email chain from December 2019 discussing therapy options for victims of Jeffrey Epstein. The sender is asking for guidance on how to respond to a request for information about available therapy resources.

persons.name: Hil
persons.context: Appears as a recipient (Cc) in the forwarded email discussing therapy options for victims.

events.title: Request for Therapy Information
events.description: An individual sends an email inquiring about therapy options available to victims, stating it would help as they think they would benefit.

events.title: Forward of Therapy Inquiry
events.description: The original request for therapy information is forwarded to another party with a question on how to respond.

keyFacts: In December 2019, there was correspondence regarding therapy options for victims of Jeffrey Epstein.
An individual expressed a personal need for therapy information, suggesting they might be a victim seeking help.
The email chain shows ongoing discussions about victim support resources following Epstein's death in August 2019.
